@imsuperman05 wrote:

umm I have no idea if this will work.

public void handleGmaulNpc() { if (c.playerIndex > 0) { if (c.npcIndex > 0 && NPCHandler.npcs[c.npcIndex] != null) { if (checkReqs()) { if (checkSpecAmount(4153)) { int damage = 0; NPCHandler.npcs[c.npcIndex].handleHitMask(damage); c.startAnimation(1667); c.gfx100(340); NPCHandler.npcs[c.npcIndex].HP -= damage; } } } } }
Test it for me.

item.title: [PI] gmaul spec wont work?
item.dc:creator: @killermoe33 killermoe33
item.description:
@killermoe33 wrote:

this is wat i got for maul:

case 4153: // maul c.startAnimation(1667); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); /*if (c.playerIndex > 0) gmaulPlayer(i); else gmaulNpc(i);*/ c.gfx100(337); break;

also this for how much spec it uses:

if(c.specAmount >= 5) { c.specAmount -= 5; c.getItems().addSpecialBar(weapon); return true; } return false;

this is void for handling gmaul:

public void handleGmaulPlayer() { if (c.playerIndex > 0) { Client o = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[c.playerIndex]; if (c.goodDistance(c.getX(), c.getY(), o.getX(), o.getY(), c.getCombat().getRequiredDistance())) { if (c.getCombat().checkReqs()) { if (c.getCombat().checkSpecAmount(4153)) { boolean hit = Misc.random(c.getCombat().calculateMeleeAttack()) > Misc.random(o.getCombat().calculateMeleeDefence()); int damage = 0; if (hit) damage = Misc.random(c.getCombat().calculateMeleeMaxHit()); if (o.prayerActive[18] && System.currentTimeMillis() - o.protMeleeDelay > 1500) damage *= .6; if(o.playerLevel[3] - damage <= 0) { damage = o.playerLevel[3]; } if(o.playerLevel[3] > 0) { o.handleHitMask(damage); c.startAnimation(1667); o.gfx100(337); o.dealDamage(damage); } } } } } else if(c.npcIndex > 0) { int x = Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcIndex].absX; int y = Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcIndex].absY; if (c.goodDistance(c.getX(), c.getY(), x, y, 2)) { if (c.getCombat().checkReqs()) { if (c.getCombat().checkSpecAmount(4153)) { int damage = Misc.random(c.getCombat().calculateMeleeMaxHit()); if(Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcIndex].HP - damage < 0) { damage = Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcIndex].HP; } if(Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcIndex].HP > 0) { Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcIndex].HP -= damage; Server.npcHandler.npcs[c.npcIndex].handleHitMask(damage); c.startAnimation(1667); c.gfx100(340); } } } } } }

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] gmaul spec wont work?
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

Is the special accually added? as in if you search in combatassistant.java (src\server\model\players) and you search for 11694 you should see something like this:

case 11694: // ags c.startAnimation(7074); c.specDamage = 1.30; c.specAccuracy = 4.55; c.gfx0(1222); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break

Then search for 4153 (thats the g mauls item id). if you dont find it, under the one for ags, add this:

case 4153: // maul c.startAnimation(1667); c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); /*if (c.playerIndex > 0) gmaulPlayer(i); else gmaulNpc(i);*/ c.gfx100(337); break;

then search for 11694 again. and you should see a bunch of cases then this:

if(c.specAmount >= 5) { c.specAmount -= 5; c.getItems().addSpecialBar(weapon); return true; } return false;

just above that, add: case 4153:
that will make the g maul use 50% of special attack, then since you said the special attack bar is already there for it, you dont have to add it.

Hope this helps.

Read full topic
